article.headline: Lamar 91, Tulsa 85
article.story: TULSA, Okla. (AP) -- Raymond Anthony scored 25 points, including 10 in the final 1:11, as Lamar snapped a 17-game road losing streak with a 91-85 victory over Tulsa Wednesday. Alan Daniels scored 24 points on 9-of-14 shooting for Lamar (6-3), while Teddy Davis added 17 and forward Josh Grant had 12 points and 13 rebounds. Lamar outrebounded Tulsa 42-30 and forced 21 turnovers, including 11 steals. Tulsa (2-5) cut an 18-point second-half deficit to 67-65 with 5:15 to play, thanks mostly to Seneca Collins, who scored all of his 16 points in the second half. But the Cardinal scored on consecutive possessions, first on a drive by Anthony followed by a layup by Daniels. After Tulsa's Anthony Price missed the front end of a 1-and-1, Daniels swished a 3-pointer to make it 74-65. Tulsa couldn't rally after the Cardinals made 17-of-18 free throws in the second half, 23-of-25 for the game. Price led Tulsa with 23 points, while Jarius Glenn had 17 points. The Cardinals finished the first half with an 8-1 flurry, scoring off turnovers. A 3-pointer by Blake Whittle made it 37-27, then Davis scored and added a 3-pointer with four seconds left for a 42-28 halftime advantage. Lamar pushed the lead to 53-35 early in the second half, helped by three 3-pointers by Daniels and Anthony.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
